Text: Jag har letat efter det h채r spelet ett bra tag... TACK!
Same here. Stuck at 99.4%. Seems noone has been able to get 100% of the file yet, so we can't help seed.
It would seem the KoDP.nrg file is corrupted or broken.
So anyone got it to work?

It's not corrupted for me.  Came down just fine, and the zipped NRG CD image works fine in Alcohol.

Some brief testing seems to show the game plays just fine.  I haven't tested long, but, if I find that the release is problematic, I'll come back here and post about it.  As it stands, great release of this rare gem, and thanks, jmard5!

NRG -file mounts on demon tools, and I can play it from the "CD". But if I try to run setup, there is an error:

"Setup is unable to find installation lanuages in \SETUP.LID file. Error 105"

Can't patch without installing, which is a bit of a problem. I actually had this game bought some ten years ago, but lost the CD. Damn good game, if I can't get it again, might try to buy it again.
... might be a problem windows x64. Anyone got the game working on it?

All right. So I didn't get the game to work on Win X64, but after installing win2000 with Virtual PC, it's working fine.

http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=04d26402-3199-48a3-afa2-2dc0b40a73b6&displaylang=en&tm#filelist
It also works fine when you used "play from CD" option

Hey. If you copy the files on the .nrg file when you mount it over to a separate folder and then copy the files in the update into there required locations, then it will work perfectly. That's how I did it anyway. Hope this helps!
